description: Chuck Hunter's passion for his art is evident as each key responds to the young virtuoso's touch. The music rises then retreats, faster then slower, softer then lounder. The beautiful young man surrenders to the force of the music and thoughts of his wild lover BJâ€ˆSlater. As the music swells, the loving couple sinks further and further into an ocean of wild passions. The music and frenzied sex build in intensity, ever increasing in tempo and excitement. In heated measure, Chuck, BJ and the music finally reach for a climax and a final release, leaving them heaving and sighing in beautifully realized harmony.
title: Command Performance
